name: Dog's Best Friend
description:
Made in 48 hours from scratch, solo, for Ludum Dare 46 - Compo

Help your human through the dangerous forest!

~5 minute playtime

Controls - Keyboard

wasd/zqsd/zasd/,aoe - move
spacebar - bark
F - toggle fullscreen
Esc - Quit
1,2,3,4,0 - Graphics Settings (1, 2, 3, 4, auto)

Controls - Controller

Left Joystick - move
A/X/B - bark

source code: https://github.com/MattWoelk/DogsBestFriend
